question: A can complete a work in 10 days. How many days will A take to complete 50% of the work?
B can finish a job in 15 days. What fraction of the work does B complete in one day?
A and B together can complete a work in 6 days. If A alone can do it in 10 days, how many days will B alone take?
C can do a piece of work in 8 days and D in 12 days. How long will they take together?
If 5 workers can complete a task in 20 days, how many days will 10 workers take (same efficiency)?
A can complete a work in 12 days and B in 18 days. They work together for 4 days. What fraction of work is left?
If A is twice as efficient as B and B alone can complete the work in 24 days, how many days will A alone take?
Three workers can complete a work in 9 days. How many workers are required to complete the same work in 3 days?
A can do a work in 20 days. After working 5 days, he leaves. What fraction of work remains?
A and B together can do a work in 8 days. If A alone takes 12 days, how many days does B alone take?
A, B, and C together can complete a task in 6 days. If A alone takes 18 days and B alone 9 days, how many days will C alone take?
If 8 men can complete a work in 15 days, how many men are needed to complete it in 10 days?
A can do 1/4 of a work in 5 days. How many days will he take to complete the whole work?
Pipe A fills a tank in 6 hours and Pipe B in 8 hours. How long will they take together?
A can complete a job in 16 days. B is 25% more efficient than A. How many days will B take?
If 12 workers can complete a task in 18 days, how many days will 9 workers take?
A and B together can do a work in 5 days. If B alone takes 20 days, how many days will A alone take?
Two pipes fill a tank in 4 hours and 12 hours respectively. If both are opened together, how long to fill the tank?
A can do a work in 30 days. B is 50% as efficient as A. How many days will B take?
A and B together can complete a work in 7 days. After 3 days A leaves. B finishes remaining work in 8 days. How many days can B alone complete the whole work?
If A is three times as efficient as B and together they complete a work in 12 days, how many days will A alone take?
10 men and 5 women complete a task in 8 days. If 1 man = 2 women in efficiency, how many days will 20 women take?
A can complete a work in 25 days. He works for 10 days and B finishes the rest in 9 days. How many days can B alone complete the whole work?
If 6 workers can build a wall in 12 days working 8 hours daily, how many days will 6 workers take working 6 hours daily?
A can do a work in 40 days. B can do it in 60 days. C is twice as efficient as B. How many days will A, B, and C together take?
A fills a tank in 10 hours, B empties it in 15 hours. If both are opened together, how long to fill the tank?
If 4 men or 6 women can complete a work in 12 days, how many days will 2 men and 3 women take?
A and B can complete a work in 9 days. B and C in 12 days. A and C in 18 days. How many days will A alone take?
A can do a work in 14 days and B in 21 days. They work together but A leaves after 4 days. How many more days will B take to finish?
A contractor planned to complete a project in 30 days with 20 workers. After 10 days, 5 workers left. How many total days will the project take (same efficiency)?
A can complete a work in 18 days. B can complete it in 24 days. How many days will they take together?
If 15 workers can complete a task in 16 days, how many workers are required to complete it in 12 days?
A can do a work in 45 days. He works for 15 days. What percentage of work is completed?
A and B together can do a job in 4 days. If A alone can do it in 12 days, how many days will B alone take?
Pipe A fills a tank in 9 hours and Pipe B in 6 hours. How long will they take together?
If 8 men can complete a work in 20 days, how many days will 5 men take?
A is 50% more efficient than B. If B takes 30 days to complete a work, how many days will A take?
A and B together can complete a work in 15 days. After 5 days, A leaves and B completes the rest in 20 days. How many days can A alone complete the work?
C can complete a work in 10 days. D is twice as efficient as C. How many days will D take?
If 12 workers can build a wall in 18 days working 6 hours daily, how many days will they take working 9 hours daily?
A can do a work in 21 days and B in 28 days. They work together for 7 days. What fraction of work remains?
If 4 men and 6 boys can complete a work in 10 days and 1 man = 3 boys, how many days will 12 boys take?
A can complete 60% of a work in 9 days. How many days will he take to complete the whole work?
Two pipes fill a tank in 5 hours and 20 hours respectively. If both are opened together, how long to fill the tank?
A can do a work in 32 days. B can do it in 48 days. How many days will they take together?
If 20 workers can complete a project in 25 days, how many workers are needed to complete it in 10 days?
A is twice as efficient as B and together they complete a work in 9 days. How many days will B alone take?
A and B can complete a work in 6 days. B and C in 8 days. A and C in 12 days. How many days will B alone take?
A fills a tank in 8 hours. A leak empties it in 24 hours. If both are open, how long to fill the tank?
If 5 men or 8 women can complete a work in 12 days, how many days will 2 men and 4 women take?
A contractor planned 40 days with 25 workers. After 20 days, 5 more workers joined. How many total days will the project take?
A can do a work in 14 days. B is 40% as efficient as A. How many days will B take?
A and B together can complete a work in 10 days. A works twice as fast as B. How many days will A alone take?
Pipe A fills a tank in 4 hours. Pipe B empties it in 8 hours. If both are opened together, how long to fill the tank?
If 9 workers complete a task in 14 days, how many days will 6 workers take?
A can complete a work in 50 days. B can complete it in 75 days. They work together for 10 days. What fraction of work remains?
A is 25% more efficient than B. If together they complete a work in 8 days, how many days will B alone take?
If 3 men can do a work in 18 days, how many days will 9 men take?
A can do a work in 24 days. After working 8 days, B joins and they finish in 8 more days. How many days can B alone complete the work?
A, B, and C together can complete a work in 5 days. If A alone takes 15 days and B alone 10 days, how many days will C alone take?
